idea-plugin.name: VisualGC
idea-plugin.description:
A realtime Visual Garbage Collection Monitoring Tool for Hotspot JVM, supports G1 and ZGC(实时垃圾回收监控)

This plugin displayed a Visual GC tool window in your IDE, only supports HotSpot JVM(JDK 1.5 to OpenJDK/Oracle JDK 17, JBR 8 ~ JBR 17). New feature: Instant run and monitor Java program GC directly in IDEA(Paid feature);
View ZGC(Z Garbage Collector) details (Paid feature);
monitoring the detailed GC activity such as G1 stop the world full connection time.
Usage: 1. From main interface bottom;
2. From menu Tools > New VisualGC Window.

Chinese Instructions Below:

实时可视化 Hotspot JVM 垃圾回收监控工具

在IDEA中显示 VisualGC 工具窗口或打开新窗口, 便于一边运行代码一边观察GC情况. 仅支持HotSpot JVM(JDK 1.5 到 OpenJDK/Oracle JDK 17, JBR 8 ~ JBR 17). 新功能: 在IDEA中直接运行并监视Java代码GC情况(付费解锁);
实时监控 ZGC(Z Garbage Collector) 详情(付费解锁);
允许监控详细的GC活动例如 G1 Full GC 消耗时间.

用法:
1) 点击停靠窗口下方的 VisualGC;
2) 打开新的独立运行窗口使用菜单 Tools > 新建 VisualGC 窗口.
